ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/ZoomExtentsModifier3.html']ZoomExtentsModifier3D[/url], [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20Orbit%20Modifier.html']OrbitModifier[/url], [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/MouseWheelZoomModifier3D.html']MouseWheelModifier[/url] works and how to rotate camera.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/ZoomExtentsModifier3.html']ZoomExtentsModifier3D[/url], [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20Orbit%20Modifier.html']OrbitModifier[/url], [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/MouseWheelZoomModifier3D.html']MouseWheelModifier[/url] works and how to rotate camera.
[b][i]Tip![/i][/b]
[b]Click RV to rotate camera verticaly or click RH and rotate camera horizontaly.[/b]
